trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示中<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateActivity 代表<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>狀態

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 狀態活動可包含一或多個<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>，或 StateActivity 類別，一個<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>類別和一個<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>類別</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState 活動用於內部<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>和<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>移動工作流程狀態。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: 可以接收的事件只有當 StateActivity 執行時，是可以由<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>StateActivity 和也<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>活動附加至封入 StateActivity 活動與根<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>中的活動</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>的事件

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: 當 StateActivity 開始執行的情況下，StateActivity 會查看是否<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>活動不存在或未。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity 可以有零個或一個<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>活動。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>活動存在於<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>將會執行。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: 只要<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>活動完成時，StateActivity 區塊事件，以便 StateActivity 只接收可由處理的事件其<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>活動。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity 是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，這表示 StateActivity 活動可以包含其他活動。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取消執行<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前的狀態<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>中執行的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前的狀態<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>中執行的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體之<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>對應於指定的子活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: 子活動。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: 動態子活動。

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: 可執行活動不包含 childActivityName 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>使用服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得服務服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要加入的活動<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> ，若是如此，驗證是否必須訂閱新加入的事件驅動。

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: 這是方法每當使用者新增的子系，就會呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>透過工作流程變更。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法是在 CompositeActivity 中定義由 StateActivity，其中它會檢查加入的活動是否覆寫<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>，如果是，驗證 是否必須訂閱新加入的事件驅動。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的活動<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫一部分的活動轉換到<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得服務服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: 保存變更追蹤資料索引鍵的字串值"StateActivity.StateChange"。

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
